reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The age of the buildings at Lower Bache gives you low, exposed beams coupled with internal and external steps (to two suites) resulting in a certain quirkiness. For some the quirkiness may be irksome for others interesting. Our suite had a large double bed, small en suite, with masses of constantly hot water, and small sitting area. There were extensive views all around the property.
reviews.title: An enjoyable visit

reviews.text: Yes, a sat nav would be helpful in finding the house which is situated down very narrow lanes.
reviews.title: Very quaint if you can find it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found breakfast to be more than adequate and the evening suppers were very enjoyable.
reviews.title: Charming & Quirky (but Tired) Lower Bache House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We can also understand some of the earlier comments but enjoyed our visit.
reviews.title: Slightly disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are concerns about this property, first there is no warning in literature that you have very little chance of finding it unless you use a sat nav or similar.secondly, the place is a positive danger with quaint but very low unprotected beams , the owner seemingly having the attitude of it being quite normal to badly injure ones head, quoting he has the scars to prove it
reviews.title: Deposit non refundable?!
